summary:
Veteran A called the facility Privacy Officer and reported they had just looked at an appointment reminder letter they had been handed at the end of their last appointment at a VA clinic and noticed Veteran B_s name, mailing address, and appointment time was on the letter. He reported there was no phone number or elements of the SSN on the document. Veteran A will be meeting with the Privacy Officer on Tuesday 5/28 to turn over the document. He will keep it secure until that time.
The Privacy Officer spoke to Veteran B and discovered he moved a month ago and the mailing address listed on the document is no longer correct.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
